# alpine publish

Publish an instance.

```
alpine publish <instance> [<instance>...]
```

## Description

Publish an instance.

## Options

```
  -e, --encrypt      Encrypt published archive (with password by default).
  -h, --help         help for publish
  -k, --public-key   Use public-key encryption.
```
